properties.entry: SELECT 'hanok' "TYPE", COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) "COUNT" FROM HANOK_RESERVATION WHERE FROM_DATE>SYSDATE UNION ALL SELECT 'horse', COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) FROM HORSE_RESERVATION WHERE HORSE_DATE>SYSDATE UNION ALL SELECT 'month', COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) FROM MONTH_RESERVATION WHERE START_DATE>SYSDATE UNION ALL SELECT 'tea', COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) FROM TEA_RESERVATION WHERE START_DATE>SYSDATE

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, MEM_ID, SUBSTR(PHONE,1,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(PHONE,10,12) "PHONE", HORSE_PRO_NAME, TO_CHAR(HORSE_DATE) "HORSE_DATE", HR.STATUS "STATUS" FROM HORSE_RESERVATION HR JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN HORSE_PROGRAM USING(HORSE_PRO_NO) ORDER BY HORSE_DATE
